body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia        An Arctic Ground Squirrel is flanked by fireweed on a hillside near Rabbit Creek. NPS Photos            A Picture's Worth a Thousand Words Not many people get the chance to see Cape Krusenstern National Monument in person, so we've taken the old adage to heart and created photo galleries of Cape Krusenstern's animals, plants and vistas so that everyone can experience their splendor.           Lights, Camera, Action! Cape Krusenstern National Monument is full of sweeping vistas and dynamic scenery that can't always be adequately captured by photographs. Check out these NPS produced videos to see Cape Krusenstern in action and tag along for a peek at some of our Junior Ranger programs.      Blogs Blogs are a great way to stay up-to-date on what's happening in your national parks.  Written by park rangers and researchers, our blogs share the latest research and activities going on in Cape Krusenstern National Monument.
title: Cape Krusenstern National Monument: Photos & Multimedia
